snippet: The trainer Larry Jones said the colt Mark Valeski would not run in the Kentucky Derby on Saturday, clearing the way for Optimizer to join the 20-horse field.
abstract: Trainer Larry Jones says colt Mark Valeski will not run in the Kentucky Derby, clearing the way for Optimizer to compete in the 20-horse field.
lead_paragraph: The trainer Larry Jones said the colt Mark Valeski would not run in the Kentucky Derby on Saturday, clearing the way for Optimizer to join the 20-horse field.

headline.main: Colt Is Out of the Derby
headline.print_headline: Colt Is Out of the Derby
